item.description:
Have you made your New Year Resolutions? NYRs.

 

Are they specific measurable goals? What is your plan?

What is the best way to make a new habit, the best way to stay on course? Most people drop off quickly.

 

This year instead of having a brunch to discuss our planned future NYRs, let's show we can stay on course. Come to this Meetup to discuss how you are doing 4 weeks out into the year.

Report your progress. Boast a little.

So come enjoy another gathering of the Inquisitives. Come hang out with old friends, and make some new friends.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Inquisitive Minds Meetup group or for Jim.
item.name: NYRs: 4 Weeks Out Brunch!
